# South Coast Salmon Monitoring and Biological Support Tender
## Solicitation Details
**Title**: South Coast Salmon Monitoring and Biological Support
**Reference Number**: PW-22-01015978
**Solicitation Number**: 30003521
**Closing Date**: December 9, 2022, 13:00:00
**Publication Date**: December 5, 2022
**Location**: British Columbia
## Notice Type and Category
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Limited Tendering
## Technical Details
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans requires enhanced salmon bycatch enumeration and biological sampling services at Groundfish Trawl Option A offload sites in Southern British Columbia.
This tender is restricted to holders of Supply Arrangement # F1054-180042, which provides for the purchase of South Coast Fall-Winter Groundfish Trawl Enhanced Salmon Catch Monitoring Services. Potential suppliers must be pre-qualified on this supply arrangement to submit a bid.
The Department is seeking a supplier who can provide reinforced salmon monitoring and biological sampling services using the Groundfish Trawling Option A method.
## Evaluation Criteria
The Department will evaluate bids based on the following criteria:
* The ability to provide enhanced salmon catch enumeration services incorporating electronic bycatch counting devices
* The ability to collect and analyze biological samples
* The ability to maintain and report the collected data

## Tender Status
This tender has expired. Suppliers are encouraged to submit their responses during the tendering period.
